video_prompt: A tiny figure walks a winding flour path towards an illuminated, giant bao bun house. Warm light emanates from its open doors and windows. Subtle steam rises from the bun's surface.
image_prompt: A whimsical, high-angle shot on a stark white background features a giant, plump, freshly steamed baozi bun serving as a house. The bun has visible folds on top, with silver-framed doors glowing yellow from within, and smaller unlit windows. A winding path of pale-yellow powder leads from the bottom right to an open door, along which a tiny figure in a blue shirt and orange backpack walks towards the bun-house from behind. Bright, even lighting creates soft shadows. Whimsical, surreal, childlike wonder.
refined_video_prompt: A tiny figure walks along a winding path, progressing towards a glowing structure. Warm light streams outwards from its open doors and windows, causing the immediate surroundings to subtly brighten. Subtle steam gently rises and curls from its surface.
